{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.11832v1", "title": "Generation of Paths for Motion Planning for a Dubins Vehicle on Sphere", "summary": "In this article, the candidate optimal paths for a Dubins vehicle on a sphere
are analytically derived. In particular, the arc angles for segments in $CGC$,
$CCC$, $CCCC$, and $CCCCC$ paths, which have previously been shown to be
optimal depending on the turning radius $r$ of the vehicle by Kumar \textit{et
al.}, are analytically derived. The derived expressions are used for the
implementation provided in
https://github.com/DeepakPrakashKumar/Motion-planning-on-sphere.", "main_category": "math.OC", "categories": "math.OC", "published": "2025-04-16T07:44:02Z"}
